sections.Term of Employment: The term of employment shall commence on April 1, 2024, and continue for a period of one year unless terminated earlier in accordance with this Agreement.
sections.Compensation: The Employee shall receive an annual base salary of $75,000, payable in accordance with the Company's standard payroll practices.
sections.Duties: The Employee shall serve as Software Engineer and shall perform all duties and responsibilities typically associated with such position.

clauses.Non-Disclosure: The Employee agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information obtained during employment.
clauses.Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California.

sections.Confidential Information: All information shared between the parties, including but not limited to trade secrets, customer data, and proprietary software code, shall be considered confidential.
sections.Term: This agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

clauses.Permitted Use: The receiving party may use confidential information solely for the purpose of evaluating potential business opportunities between the parties.
clauses.Return of Materials: Upon termination of this Agreement, all confidential materials shall be returned to the disclosing party or destroyed.
clauses.Jurisdiction: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be resolved in the courts of New York State.
